website_summaries.verdict: Six therapeutic-grade oils packaged in an attractive box well-suited for gifting.
pros: A set of six therapeutic-grade essential oils that are FDA and SGS approved
Praised for their pleasant aromas that aren't overpowering or weak
cons: Some essential oils have weaker aromas than others, but overall it's a solid choice for the price

website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive introduction to some of the most popular and often-used essential oils, this set also makes a great gift idea.
pros: Contains six of the most popular essential oils, all in 10 milliliter bottles
Most found the scents to be strong, with the application of a few drops lasting a long time in vaporizers
Comes in an attractive gift box
cons: Some buyers felt that these oils were watery and had a weak scent

customer_reviews.title: Aroma-pleasing!
customer_reviews.text: Oils are tricky to buy in a variety pack because there are always ones you don't want, sandwiched in with really good ones. This has the best of the best. I LOVE IT! And Its a really great price. Just opening the package smelled nice. I would buy this, recommend it and even give as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Momma Moki

customer_reviews.title: It’s very calming
customer_reviews.text: I have bad anxiety and tense up and get super emotional for no reason. When I am upset and need instant calming relief, I use the oils in the diffiluser and mix with water. It instantly calms me down and the feelings of stress, uncertainty, and despair just melt away. This is great for helping calm down my BPD (Borderline Personality Disorder). The peppermint oil is my favorite. They are very concentrated and all of them smell so good. I love it and when the time comes, I will definitely buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Angelika Long

customer_reviews.title: Lagunamoon Essential Oils Gift Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with a new oil diffuser that I bought. This comes with 6 different oils: Eucalyptus, Peppermint, Orange, Lavender, Lemongrass, and Tea Tree. The 6 bottles are packaged in one nice, small, black box. You are only meant to use a drop or two of the oil in an oil diffuser, so with 6 of these bottles this should last quite a while. The scents are not too overpowering which is nice. I don't much care for the Tea Tree scent, but obviously opinions of scents will vary depending on your tastes. I don't have any negatives about this product. I would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Twong92

customer_reviews.title: Good for multiple uses!
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to start by saying how much I love these oils. I originally wanted to purchase a larger set with a bigger variety of scents, but these were more in my price range and they had all the scents that I wanted the most. The orange is my absolute favorite, but they ALL smell great. Have used deluted on skin, in products I make like soaps & bath bombs, and in a diffuser. These were a good buy! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smell Amazing! When I first started using these (coming from cheap walmart oils) I noticed that my diffuser gave off more "smoke" and brightened up the room with scent much quicker. At this wonderful price for the variety you get I find it difficult to not recommend over other brands as it should last you a good while! My particular favorite is the orange mixed with peppermint! If you have ever ridden the ride soarin at Epcot it smells JUST like the orange groves when you fly through california!
customer_reviews.author: carlos santiago

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered this set of essential oils for my Muji diffuser. It works perfectly, and you just need to apply around 2 drops into some water for this to work. It's a great way of keeping your room or house smelling great! The essential oils came well packaged, and in a cute box. It makes it very easy to store the oils, and I just put the oils back in the box provided after using them. I think the sizes of the bottles are perfectly fine, and will last a long time especially with 6 different scents. Overall, good package, arrived fast, great scent and works great with my diffuser, and very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Vu

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought a diffuser and essential oil kit and (surprise, surprise) turns out they were shipping from China. I finally received the diffuser but after a while decided not to wait for the oils, which were supposedly shipping separately. I’m very glad I bought this set! It arrived nicely packaged in a compact box with a little guide explaining Helps Promote and Helps Alleviate symptoms. The scents themselves are wonderful, even the ones like orange and peppermint I didn’t think I’d like from a diffuser. I just don’t understand the negative reviews, they really make me wonder. Anyways as you can tell I’m very happy with my purchase and would heartily reccomend these oils.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah X

customer_reviews.title: Pure, high quality essential oils
customer_reviews.text: First off, they might not be the best smelling essential oils, or they might not be what you’re used to if you’re not used to quality PURE essential oils. I was pleasantly surprised by slightly earthy smell the Eucalyptus had. They come in a very nice, durable box that you can hold onto to store them. It even comes with a little basic guide for how to use them and suggested uses for each oil. I appreciate this starter kit more than some of the others, I feel like the choice of oils were way more suitable for a beginner and way more useful. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie Elaine Key

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Scents don’t smell like what they are supposed to. For example the lemongrass smells like floor cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Dissapointed. Was trying to save money but I'll rather pay the extra money for the Plant Therapy brand.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I would be recommend these oils at all
customer_reviews.text: The essential oils do not smell strong at all. They do not smell true to the names on the bottle. I bought these to go in a essential oil diffuser. I would be recommend these oils at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Don’t be fooled by the good reviews like I was. When putting these so called “oils” in my diffuser they poured out like water and had no smell.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: almost no scent
customer_reviews.text: have to return these. followed instructions. almost no smell/scent to them when used with a water diffuser/candle. Had it in a small bathroom and still didnt make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Stein

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what to think....
customer_reviews.text: These oils have the oddest smell! I love he lavender because it's less potent than any other lavender. The orange is good. The eucalyptus is ok. The tea tree seems weak but not awful. The lemongrass smells like a citronella candle. Again not awful but weird. The peppermint is terrible. It smells NOTHING like peppermint. At all. I feel like I am smelig kerosene. It's just really bad. Overall, I'm pretty disappointed but hopefully it will diffuse OK. My mother in law was diffusing the lavender at her house and it really smelled great. Almost like tea. So we'll see. I just can't get over how bad the peppermint is!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: All but the orange and the lavender smell like a citronella candle.
customer_reviews.author: Taylorchristen7

customer_reviews.title: The orange oil smells like cheap laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and diluted. The orange oil smells like cheap laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What is this?!
customer_reviews.text: My essential oils came in the form of a Harry Pottery quill and ink set.....sad I even had to give one star.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Lerette

customer_reviews.title: High chemical base smell!
customer_reviews.text: The oils smell like ALL of them uses a chemical base then add whatever scent to it. They are very offensive odors not calming or relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Strong and natural
customer_reviews.text: Love these oils. I am so buying more. I got these to make body scrubs, face masks, bath bombs, and shower melts. These oils are amazing. All you need is only two drops in whatever you're making. You can even put two drops on top of old heated wax to insert fragrance around a room. This is my go-to oil for everything!
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: Beyond expectation
customer_reviews.text: This is something I only thought would smell good and cheaper than using perfume spray in the house, but it is actually better! The orange one smells so good.
customer_reviews.author: Liz_869

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I wish the aroma was stronger But this can be accomplished by using a few more drops in my diffuser. Very nice to find a set with a good variety. There was a question recently regarding the ingredients, the label indicates 100% natural plant-based ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Pryor

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt have any fragance
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt have any fragance, you need a lot of drops for a little smell
customer_reviews.author: mdzgt

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I like 👍 all the scents besides lavender that you can't beat the frankincense.
customer_reviews.author: SCNana

customer_reviews.title: Essential oils top 6
customer_reviews.text: I love my essential oils. This is a great set. It has all my favorites. I have the lavender mixed with just a little lemon to relax and some clarity in my diffuser. These oils smell very good and you only need a few drops.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Fake oils
customer_reviews.text: These oils are not 100 percent pure. One way to tell is the way it pours. They pour like water. I also did the drop test on white paper and it failed using the peppermint. My first warning was a huge made in China sign on the package. Also there is warning to not ingest which peppermint oil should be safe. You can eat a peppermint leaf! Since it is coming from overseas there is no telling what additives are in them. I trashed them.
customer_reviews.author: thesavants08

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.... and no smell. Is this real essential oil???
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fill my room with nice scents, but I don't smell anything with these. They are like water and do not have any scent to it. This just disperses and disappears.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality oils.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the smell of these oils and they all smell very similar. I would not recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!! Great variety of great scents—not the least favorite kind.. Have used quite a few brand and this is definitely high quality! Would love to see customer loyalty perks and special offers as I am using more and more oils and would love to be committed to one brand!! Definitely recommend!! Promise—great stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Leandra Volpe

customer_reviews.title: These are a must have!
customer_reviews.text: I am a nail blogger so nail care is super important to me. I use these oils daily in my nail care routine! Not only are they great smelling , that have great health benefits. For example I use the lemon oil to promote the strength of my nails and the peppermint to increase bloodflow( which makes them grow faster). I’m also a mom and as such I love using these oils as a safe alternative in making cleaning products. These oils have antibacterial qualities that keep my home safe without toxic household cleaners!
customer_reviews.author: Nailsbymonet

customer_reviews.title: WORST essential oils ever.
customer_reviews.text: I never leave reviews, but I wanted to save someone from spending the time or money on these. I only gave it one star, because the packaging was nice. They smell NOTHING like essential oils. It was an overwhelming chemical smell, and it instantly gave me a headache. I have been using essential oils for YEARS, and these are NOT essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Whitley Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set and exactly the oils I use and need. Everything was sealed nicely and came well protected. Also much cheaper to buy the set than separately.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product is a prime example of false advertising. The fragrances are nothing like the description. Only the orange smelled a bit like orange, all the others were just vomit- inducing smells. I was so disgusted with the entire product, I threw it out after only one use. 🤢😡
customer_reviews.author: Godchild

customer_reviews.title: Cute package but smells awful.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the smells would be great but they didn’t smell good at all. They all smell the same and even peppermint wasn’t appealing. How do you mess up peppermint. I now stick with dotera.
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed.....
customer_reviews.text: Very unimpressed with these oils. I ran each of them then my brand new diffuser and they barely produced a scent. My daughter had oils she bought at Kohls that are much, much better. Sadly I can't recommend these oils.
customer_reviews.author: D. Collins

customer_reviews.title: I really like the cute packaging. But it lacks in smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell is not very strong but they are really nice either way. The packaging is really cute and despite having to use more than what is recommended to have a lasting scent they are good. I would recommend them to maybe make it a little more potent in smell. These would make really great gifts to friends and families. I will try the other sents before I decide whether I want to buy this product again for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C.

customer_reviews.title: Oil tops were not secure!!! Oil spills!!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived damaged! One of the oils was empty and had spilled out in the box. The ring around the bottle that is supposed to keep it secure was loose on all the bottles as well. I was very disappointed with the quality of this order. I really only received 5 bottles filled and all covered in the oil from the remaining bottle.
customer_reviews.author: devonne swain

customer_reviews.title: Do your research!
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner in essential oils and bought this bundle as a starter. Unfortunately, I cannot use anything other than the lavender and eucalyptus because the other oils are not good for pets. That is due to my lack of research. The lavender is nice though! I use it in my humidifer before bed and it really relaxes me. The only thing that bothers me is the bottle and the droplet hole, its hard to control how much oil goes into the water. Sometimes it wont come out at all and other times it almost pours out! Other than that, everything works and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed!!
customer_reviews.text: The scents are terrible . They do not even smell like oils ,but more like cheap body spray . I am very diddapointed with these oils. Also the oil comes out way too quickly out of the bottle . I am definitely returning them ! !
customer_reviews.author: Rose Victoria

customer_reviews.title: No thanks.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box it was a nice design and separated nicely. The only problem was the smell was horrid once it was open. One of the bottles was open and had leaked. I figured I could get over it and still use the others but they all smelled the same and it was awful. I’ve had various brands of oils and this by far is the worst I’ve purchased. The eucalyptus smelled nothing like how it should they were all strong scented and similar and gave me a headache more than anything. Unfortunately I do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Lestinson

customer_reviews.title: Check for label swaps
customer_reviews.text: The scents are really quite good imo, but I deducted 1 star because the orange had leaked a little ahead of its arrival and the scent was a bit overwhelming in box. I deducted 2 more stars because my girlfriend is allergic to tea tree oil, and the tea tree and peppermint labels were swapped. She had a bad reaction for this and was very upset. I thought this must be an impossible mistake, but blind smell tests with 5 other people confirmed. Luckily she is not deathly allergic, but the hives could have been avoided entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself time and don’t buy these
customer_reviews.text: I would give zero stars if I could and I have never rated anything on Amazon with less than 3 stars. These essential oils do not even remotely smell like the scents they are supposed to. I have been using essential oils for my diffuser for years and I always try different brands from amazon or Marshall’s and this brand is by far the worst. The package had a heavy stench of orange cleaning soap before I even unwrapped the box. I tried a mix of eucalyptus, peppermint, and tea tree in my diffuser and it smells disgusting, like cleaning soap. Extremely disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Little leaky
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying this stuff I love it for the quantity and price but every time I’ve ordered it they come leaking, it’s a shame because if they were screwed on just a little bit tighter they would make a great gift. I will still use this product despite the fact they come a little leaky
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Never knew we had so many use cases
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and now she uses these oils everywhere. She started making bath bombs, so infused them with oils, we have a humidifier with an oil diffuser pad that we used some of this in, also used some of it in massage oil. Pretty sure we'll be able to find more uses. The packaging is great - it looks like a gift, the bottles are snug in place and appropriately padded. It also comes with a pamphlet of information that has the characteristics of each oil. So, if you or someone you're gifting this to is into those beliefs like how eucalyptus is for 'calming and relaxation', then that'll help with that immersion.
customer_reviews.author: Nuggets

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent but pretty good otherwise
customer_reviews.text: These oils looked like a good replacement for the more "expensive" brand names. They came packave well and I could smell them through the packaging, checked for leaks but there wasn't any. These are very strong smelling and definitely need just a few drops, any more than that and my head starts hurting. These are pretty good, but a little strong for me. There isn't anything wrong with strong, I just am scent sensitive to very strong smells.
customer_reviews.author: kelly mancini

customer_reviews.title: They stink
customer_reviews.text: These do NOT smell good. They have a very chemical smell to them. It does not matter if they are in a diffuser, or smelling them out of the bottle. I am very disappointed after waiting so long for them to come in.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Skeen

customer_reviews.title: Not Strong Enough
customer_reviews.text: Puchased this set of oils to use with my diffusel...not a good purchase. The first 30 to 45 minutes the smell is everywhere in the house, however, an hour into using the diffusel, the smell is gone....no aroma and if you get close to the unit to smell the vapor...no smell. These oils are not strong enough and therefore the aroma of the oil will only last about 30 minutes or so. I have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Q

customer_reviews.title: These smell in part like gasoline!
customer_reviews.text: These smell in part like gasoline!! Not natural smelling at all and the scent is very weak too. I have previously used Now and Eden’s Garden brand oils and highly recommend both. You truly get what you pay for and while they might be more expensive - I literally just threw money out the door with these. I think I will try and return them. Just gross!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: No smell, watered down
customer_reviews.text: None of the oils smell like they're supposed to. These are hot garbage. Listen to the one star reviews. But if you're like me you're reading this because you just bought one and you're wondering if anybody else has the same problem - or it's just you. It's not you, these things are watered down and smell like #2.
customer_reviews.author: BobaFetch

customer_reviews.title: The contents of each bottle smelled nothing like the name of the scent
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use very high end quality essential oils. Thought I would give this set a try....price was right. When I opened the package there was a strong chemical smell on the envelope. The contents of each bottle smelled nothing like the name of the scent. Each had a strong chemical scent almost like insecticide. Certainly not pure! Scared the heck out of me!. No telling what was in those bottles being passed off as essential oils...which were Made in China, what do ya know! Buy at your own risk folks.
customer_reviews.author: Va

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this set twice. The first set seemed to have better scent than the second. The second set didn't smell right. The peppermint smelled like chemicals and the tea tree and eucalyptus smelled exactly the same. I kind if wonder if these aren't actually bottled in China under a US label. My daughter received a different brand of a similar low-cost set for Christmas that actually had a much better scent. I will probably stick with more recognizable brands next time to ensure product quality: Grove collaborative, Aura Cacia, etc. Even Better Homes and Gardens was better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer z

customer_reviews.title: Not true to smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I love oils and needed new ones for my diffuser. It had all my favorites and the price was reasonable. But they are NOT real oils. They do not smell like their scent and have all the same kind of smell and does not pour out thick like an oil would. It’s pure water and empties quickly because you need atleast 20 drops to smell anything. Terrible buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Cute set, box and bottles are VERY small. Even tho size is there, you don’t realize until you get it. Makes a great gift for someone you know likes oils, or even for like a teacher or baby sitter. Great stocking stuffer. It would be nice if they included something for what each oil is helpful for though. No droppers. I didn’t expect their to be but my grandmom did!!! But she’s enjoying aromatherapy so I though this would be good to see what she likes best, then order bigger bottles down the line of specific scents.
customer_reviews.author: Tirotarot

customer_reviews.title: SCENTS
customer_reviews.text: I find these to be NOT strong enough in scent at all...have to put triple the amount of oil in the water. Just beware & know this when you go to purchase, I like to smell the scents ALOT more, this is why we purchase them to begin with. I won't be buying sets anymore. Will only find STRONG scents (single) that I will enjoy...you get what you pay for...what works for one person does not always for for all. That goes for anything in this life.....
customer_reviews.author: LEL

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: First, let me clarify my goal. I did not get these essential oils for health reasons. Instead, all I wanted was to use it as air freshener in my car. I got a top of the line diffuser and these essential oils were an automatic recommendation by Amazon. I tried all 6 essences and NONE of them lasted more than a day. Even when I soak the diffuser, no one could tell there was any smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Pagani

customer_reviews.title: Weak sauce
customer_reviews.text: It smells good for individual use, but I can’t say it lasts long. Definitely unacceptable for use in a diffuser. Normally, I can use 2-3 drops in a big diffuser. In a few days I’ve used about half the bottle because the smell almost immediately dissipates. I’m a reasonable person, I just truly don’t understand how this has so many great reviews. My only conclusion is that the great reviews are from people who haven’t used full strength oils because there really isn’t a comparison. These are barely oils and it’s worth it to invest more money in better oils.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: The oils are so good! I use all of them in the morning and night! The lavender is good for skin and hair. It has helped my hair loss and my skin. It also has rosemary and teas tree. These are potent oils! Believe me I have tried about 7 brands and this one is incredible for the price. I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mtrivedi

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is nice but the oils themselves smell terrible. My husband thought I had sprayed for bugs just from getting a brief smell of the open bottle. I didn’t think any of the scents smelt like what they were supposed to and was disappointed in all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All of the oils have a strange bug spray smell.
customer_reviews.text: I use oils for my diffuser. I have had oils from another popular company and figured I would try these . Very dissatisfied with the unpleasant odor these give off when using my diffuser all the scents have the same bug spray like scent. Would not recommend buying these oils . Price was reasonable but there are more quality oils that smell way better at a comparable price. Don't bother trying to save the extra few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Pungent/Pureness is Questionable
customer_reviews.text: Tea tree oil was incredibly pungent (almost smelled like gasoline) and leaked in the package causing everything to reek. The oils all had an "off" smell and certainly didn't smell pure once in the diffuser. I do not recommend. 2 stars for fast delivery and the eucalyptus oil (the only one in the pack that seemed to be a genuine essential oil).
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: I'd like to give the product itself 0 stars
customer_reviews.text: One star only because it was delivered when promised! I'd like to give the product itself 0 stars. I'm not sure if it is an age issue or it's plain junk oils, but there is absolutely NO aroma from any of these oils. You can smell them when you open the bottles, though the scents are muddy. But, once put in the diffuser....nothing......and I put in many many drops and still nothing. Look elsewhere for your diffuser oils. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Adams

customer_reviews.title: Scents arent strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom as a Christmas gift for her aromatherapy bracelet. The scents were strong in the box, but I think that's because they were all together. When she used it for her bracelet, they weren't as strong. Even when I sniffed the individual bottles, I really couldn't smell it. Perhaps I need to open it and smell it. I purchased this because of another reveiwer saying her friend's aromatherapy necklace calmed others in her office. I was hoping this would be strong enough to do the same.
customer_reviews.author: reina609

customer_reviews.title: Nice giftable packaging, Quality Oils
customer_reviews.text: Delivery: Arrived quicker than the expected date was shown. packaging: Great presentation with the premium packaging, Great as a gift set. All 6 oil sets are intact in their place for good packaging. A few months ago I ordered another essential oil set from another company, they came as broken. But this one came in a solid premium and great looking package. Price: you are paying for quality so the value is really there. Quality: I love these oils. This kit had all the flavors I use on a regular basis for my family's care. Few Drops(6-10) are enough for my 500ml diffuser, they are strong and last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Hussain Islam

customer_reviews.title: Longevity and scents are top notch!
customer_reviews.text: I loved that this product came in such nice packaging. My first impression was great. These essential oils would be easily giftable right out of the shipping container. I loved the lemongrass and the orange. All of the oils smelled amazing but the citrusy ones are my favorite. I used the orange oil in the hot water along with carpet shampoo to clean my carpets with. It has been almost a week and I still get the orange essence when I walk through the door. I cannot wait to use a few of these in my wax melt warmer and in my laundry. They are so soothing and relaxing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: I really tried with these but overall this was just not a good purchase for me. While the Orange and Peppermint smell good and as you would expect them to, I was pretty disappointed in the others. The Eucalyptus and Tea Tree smell exactly the same a both smell a lot like a product called Tag Off for removing skin tags. The Lemongrass has a floor cleaner smell to it and the Lavender, just yuck. I appreciate that they included a sheet with suggestions on scent combinations but given that 4 of the 6 scents included smell odd, it made for some really unpleasant smells.
customer_reviews.author: Megan E.

customer_reviews.title: Strong Fragrances!
customer_reviews.text: I love good smells at home and these ones did not disappoint! It came in a good package, no leaking or bad conditions. The scents are strong saving drops to a long lasting fragrance at home. I use the oils in a diffuser and it spreads all around the room and sometimes, if the AC is on, all over the home. I really liked these essences, my favorite is orange and peppermint, If you want a good and long lasting smells you are looking for these ones. It came in a good package, no leaking or bad conditions.
customer_reviews.author: SandyM

customer_reviews.title: 👃
customer_reviews.text: These were my first essential oils so for the price it was a decent introduction. I use them in my diffuser. The lavender, tea tree, and orange scents are strong but nice. The lavender gave me a headache until I got used to it. The eucalyptus and peppermint, which I normally love, smell off to the point I don't like or use them. The lemongrass smells so putrid that just opening the bottle makes me feel sick. They fade quickly. Update: Bought oils from a different brand and I will never use these again. Better quality ones are smoother than these, no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Weak scents
customer_reviews.text: I would not purchase these again. While they are packaged nicely in a firm box with a little piece of foam and smell very good through the box, the scents don't last long at all. I smell them very well for about the first 30 minutes of running my diffuser, but after that I smell absolutely nothing. Some of the scents (like orange and lavender) barely make it past those 30 minutes. This is my first time trying essential oils so I'm going to order another set from another company. Hopefully I will get different results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging and variety, just smelled different than other brands I have
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to diffuse in my office as I didn’t want to bring my more expensive bottles. I found the scents to be a bit different than I’m used to, especially the lemongrass scent. I ended up stopping the usage because they gave me headaches. I think they might work well for others but I personally didn’t care for them
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Not in love but could be worse
customer_reviews.text: I might be a EO snob but I didn’t really like these. They say 100% pure but they smell a bit synthetic to me. Great price, which kind of says a lot as far as quality. Perhaps it’s just because I am use to Young Living but was just looking for some cheaper oils for my kids diffusers at bedtime. Some of them smell better then others so it could just be subjective, but I did used to sell some essential oils (not YL) and these did not impress me at all. Probably won’t buy again but worth a shot if you don’t have a ton of money for oils.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Most affordable essential oil set — I’ve seen so far.
customer_reviews.text: I used on a humidifier that had an essential oil pad. It smells great and really relaxing. I’ve fallen asleep 30mins so I can’t tell if the scent lingers but it does smell great. I also tried putting it on my mask (1 drop) and the lavender calms me down when I get anxious. The packaging was also great. This has been the most affordable essential oil set I have ever seen. I’m so glad amazon sponsored the oils. It was the first thing that popped up when I was searching for oils!!
customer_reviews.author: Chukz2Go

customer_reviews.title: Lavender and citrus okay, other oils don’t smell quite right
customer_reviews.text: These were inexpensive, so I wasn’t expecting top quality. The lemongrass and eucalyptus smell artificial, and the peppermint doesn’t quite smell right. However, the tea tree is okay, the citrus is good, and the lavender is great. When diffusing, the scents don’t seems to last quite as long as other brands of essential oils. I haven’t noticed any new headaches or breathing issues as a result of using them (as can sometimes happen with certain cheap oils).
customer_reviews.author: BNM

customer_reviews.title: They all smell the same?!
customer_reviews.text: To be completely honest, I cannot tell these scents apart. It's Iike the person who packaged them mixed up all the scents and just poured the mixture into all the bottles because they smell so similar. I tried to make soap with them and it was indistinguishable from the way Dial smells. And the smell makes my sinuses hurt. It's heavy and strong and even in small quantities doesn't smell like the things it's essenced from. I'm gonna invest in a single higher quality fragrance oil instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wright

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch or watered down ?
customer_reviews.text: I do lot like writing this review. The reason is because I have purchased this last set before from Laguna. They were and are great. Using them on a different floor of the house. However my newest order of the same pack, very little scent , And one of them smells like a moldy bathroom. I don’t know if this is just a bad batch or they been diluted with water or something. But I’ll continue to buy from P & J company. They are always consistent
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Smell really nice
customer_reviews.text: I use these oils with my diffuser / humidifier. I really like the scent of almost all of these (orange is not a personal preference of mine). I find them to be a higher quality, more "clean" scent than other brands I have tried. I find them also to almost all be complimentary to one another and I'm able to make some really pleasing blends with this set. My one complaint is the packaging. It can be a bit difficult to dispense the oil at times.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I got a bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I'm gonna be honest. I didn't wanna invest the money in exspensive oils. Saw this and saw that it got good reviews thought I'd give it a try. Bad mistake I can't figure out what the smells are supposed to be I tried the peppermint my diffuser thank God it was hard to get it to come out of the bottle because once it did its dank to high heaven I can't figure out what this smell is.don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: KCooney2120

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful scents
customer_reviews.text: How I use this product: I put 2-3 drops of one oil on an oil diffuser pendant's felt pad and wear the oil diffuser pendant on a chain all day long. Analysis: The scents are neither overwhelming nor weak. They smell great from the start through the day's end. I appreciated the pamphlet explaining what oil is supposed to help with what, along with some mixing ideas (collocation). I've used the lavender, peppermint, eucalyptus, lemongrass, and orange. So far, i love them all!
customer_reviews.author: J&S Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Smelled great in my new burner and a good price.
customer_reviews.text: It came in a hard box that kept the oils protected during shipment. I was worried it might break before I got it so I was glad that wasn’t the case. I’ve used 3 of the scents so far in the burner I bought a few weeks ago and I really liked the orange and lavender scents. The peppermint smell was nice as well and was reminiscent of Christmas. Great price as well. I’d recently bought just peppermint in a little bigger size and paid more for it than I did this entire set.
customer_reviews.author: tracy c.

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The box was stuck togther and sticky with a toxic aroma. Upon prying the box open the orange was half gone as well as some from 2 others. All of the lids were very loose. They all smelled so toxic and fowl that I repackaged and tossed on the porch for my local UPS driver to pick up tomorrow( I feel really bad for him tomorrow) No need in worrying about it being stolen because it smells so awful.
customer_reviews.author: kellie

customer_reviews.title: Strong but good!
customer_reviews.text: We bought our moms an infuser for mothers day and added these with their gift. One of our moms put a few too many drops (5) in the infuser and it was strong! I have many different oils and brands at home, some I can put on my skin without worrying because they are not as strong. These are very strong and will need to be diluted before applying to skin. My husband and I were so impressed by the strength that we bought some for ourselves. Now we have some stronger oils ready for the infuser but also roll on oils. Great buy and a great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Parvib

customer_reviews.title: waste of money, cheap and diluted stuff
customer_reviews.text: oils do not have that smell at all, we used it in vaporizer and we did not smell anything good at all. these are absolutely cheap and diluted stuff selling on site I do not even know how in this world they received these positive reviews, they are not even worth a dollar. We are going to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Mogli

customer_reviews.title: I love these.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a scented or essential oils expert, but I really like these. I have used them in homemade candles, in a humidifier, and, recently, in homemade sanitizer. My wife is fairly sensitive to scents, but she likes these. Again, I am no expert, but I am really pleased. I might try another product to compare, but I would definitely order more of these. I've had them for a long time, and I still have at least a few drops left in all the bottles, so I'd say the scents are potent enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tiberius

customer_reviews.title: Oh my sweet orange!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful product! I am so impressed with everything about this essential oil gift box. The box that it came in was a beautiful gift all by itself. Even the oils we're all placed in the box facing in the same direction, with the lid in the same direction as the oils. Who would have thought?! I would buy this product many times over to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great smells, doesn’t last long though.
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand - I especially love the eucalyptus and peppermint smell. However, I’ve noticed that the smell doesn’t last as long as I’d like for it to.. Resulting in me using more drops than I’d like. I get that the humidifiers aren’t used really for room fragrance but I’d like an essential oil to atleast last more than 5 minutes for me to smell it.
customer_reviews.author: MaeMae

customer_reviews.title: ⚠️⚠️⚠️Deadly to Dogs!!
customer_reviews.text: ⚠️ ****WARNING****⚠️ This has nothing to do with the product being bad. It’s a great product and I would give it 5 STARS I only gave it 1 STAR so u would read this. All and any essential oils are very deadly to DOGS and CATS!! I called my vet and he verified it. When I started using this my Dogs wouldn’t stop coughing and it worried me so check with ur dogs vet before purchasing. I have an appointment Monday but he says to stop using it immediately!
customer_reviews.author: John John

customer_reviews.title: Essential oil set review
customer_reviews.text: I really like the nice box that these oils come in to hold them all. Very convenient. I loved the orange, lavender , eucalyptus, and peppermint. I use them in my oil diffuser. The orange is my favorite. Works well and gives a great aroma. I gave a 4 star because I didn't really like the teatree, or lemongrass. Other than that these oils are great. I enjoy having a variety of oils for keeping my home smelling fresh and relaxing. I will probably find a use for the other scents. This set of essential oils are really nice. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole E.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Scents Great Varieties
customer_reviews.text: This brand of essential oils smell great. They also have some of the best varieties in their muli packs. I have purchased them more than once and will continue to come back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Cute box, but SMELLS LIKE URINE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 1 star, I would. All the oils smelled exactly the same; like a urinal. None of the scents were good, and they certainly did not smell like what they’re labeled as. I noticed it as soon as I opened the box, but figured it was just all the scents mixing together that wasn't sitting right. So I took all the caps off and smelled each one individually... All of them literally smell like urine, with maybe a little citronella mixed in. I will be returning this set because I would rather not have my home smell like a mens restroom at a football stadium...
customer_reviews.author: Juno

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Package came totally open, bottles almost split everywhere. Next time please use duck tape to secure box. I’m using the essential oils with a 550ml diffuser, I first tried with 4 drops of essential oils, but scent didn’t last too long. I recommend to use more drops to have a long lasting effect.
customer_reviews.author: Diana E.

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try it with my humidifier i recently purchased and I love it. I liked it packaging and I totally think it is a great gift material. There are 6 different essential oils. My favorite is peppermint and lavender. I use it for everything (oil diffuser, lotions, bath, skin, henna). My house smells great. I also try experimenting with these oil by mixing it and trying to get a different smells. I think everyone should give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Pikachhu

customer_reviews.title: Good for it’s price but personally don’t like the scents
customer_reviews.text: They all kinda smell weird. I thought they’d smell really nice like the bath and body stuff for lavender and peppermint but they all smell very medicinal to me. I thought the orange scent would smell nice at least but they’re just ok. Maybe it’s a personal preference but I didn’t like any of them. They came in packaged really well besides a small dent in th corner of the box, but it would be a wonderful gift if they preferred these kinds of scents.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie_Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Nice fragrant aroma oil
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack of oils for my diffuser. These oils are very much fragrant and I can feel the aroma of it in the whole room depending on the moment. There are 6 different oils have a very pleasant aroma, but my favorites are the eucalyptus and peppermint that I put in my room and seem to help me think and concentrate better. I am very satisfied with the purchase and recommend it to all people who are looking for good essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Praveen

customer_reviews.title: They Smell like floor wax !  Don't waste your money !!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed.! These oils smell like some kind of chemical mixed with something else. I'm very happy to say that the whole box will be SLAM DUNKED IN THE GARBAGE CAN !! I knew I should've stuck with the pure Jolly aromatherapy essential oils that I purchased before.! this was a waste of my money they smell HORRIBLE !! Its almost like a waxy floor cleaner scent . I will NEVER purchase this or any product with that name EVER .!
customer_reviews.author: radiance

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing I've ever smelled.
customer_reviews.text: Some of these were the worst thing I've ever smelled and that's not an exaggeration. The lemon grass especially made me immediately start gagging. They smell like scented versions of an industrial chemical like a paint thinner. There is no way these are the natural oils they're claimed to be. The whole set went straight in the outside garbage a minute after opening them.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Just ok. Not really impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Some of them have chemical qualities. Some don't really impart a scent when I put them in the diffuser/humidifier. -- I will buy another brand next time. -- Sadly, the elegant packaging was the best thing about them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Orchid

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety, good value for essential oils.
customer_reviews.text: These are very concentrated. My daughter uses a sensory necklace with essential oils for sensory processing disorder, she soaks cotton with oil and wears them on her neck in a special made necklace, so food and other smells don't bother her. She loved the smells of all but the tea tree and eucalyptus which I gave to my mom. My mom uses those on her feet and she said they are nice. All in all a good value and working good for us so far.
customer_reviews.author: BrendaB

customer_reviews.title: Made in CHINA.. No thank you, The Lemongrass smells like citronella! Not lemongrass at all
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like the fact I didn’t see originally this is made in China. Will not by this again. Keep it in the USA. Also the lemongrass is NOT lemongrass. It’s citronella. I know what lemongrass smells like and it’s not lemongrass smell it’s citronella and I’m very upset about that. Will not by this again
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, lame scents, no ease of use, Do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Presentation looks nice enough to gift out, but the actual oils are not really worth. First, you have to shake the oils upside-down to get anything out and it takes forever. Then the scents are very weak. Peppermint does not smell right, smells weird. Orange is the only scent I thought was okay and it was still a lot of shaking to get any scent, and I always got the oil on my hands. Droppers are much better, but this item does not come with droppers. I would not recommend this products. Looks can be deceiving. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: bd

customer_reviews.title: A nice product with a good mix of scents
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these oils to use with my oil diffuser. Out of the box, these looks pretty. There is a good variety of scents and the bottles are an average size of normal essential oil bottles. My favorite scent is the Eucalyptus Or the tea tree. They are refreshing and strong enough but not over powering. I HATE the lemongrass. It's over powering and VERY strong even with a few small drops. The rest are a faint smell but pleasant. Overall, for the price, these are worth it
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Good Strong Scent For My Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I have been extremely leery of purchasing essential oils from companies I have not heard of because they may not work well or the scent is not strong enough so I decided to try out Lagunamoon. Each individual oil in this variety set have a good strong smell. I’m not using this particular companies oils for topical but for my oil diffuser and they do scent up my bedroom and living room. I will definitely purchase more oils from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Cheever-Perry

customer_reviews.title: Got it quickly was able to use as intended.
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived the peppermint oil had leaked all over the inside of the package due to a loose lid. Bottle still had about 1/10 of its contents and my house still smells strongly of mint a day after opening it. Was still able to use it for its intended purpose, but in the future it may be helpful to check seals on the bottles before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: JenCharbo

product_meta.title: Lagunamoon Essential Oils Top 6 Gift Set Pure Essential Oils for Diffuser, Humidifier, Massage, Aromatherapy, Skin & Hair Care
feature_bullets: This gift set includes six 10mL bottles of aromatherapy essential oils: lemongrass, peppermint, orange, lavender, eucalyptus, and tea tree. Achieve greater mind acuity & promote & and happiness with this set.Easy to mix and match for blending or dilution purposes.

Set features lemongrass for calmness & clarity, peppermint for concentration & clear thinking, orange for optimism & peace, lavender for cognitive functions & alertness, eucalyptus for optimism & concentration, & tea tree for mental strength & calmness

Essential oils are used for aromatherapy, Ayurveda, steam inhalations, skin care, massage, natural perfumery, baths, hair care, saunas, air freshening, compresses, vaporization, chakra balancing, or to enhance shampoos, lotions, creams, soaps & bath bombs

To protect your rights and avoid unauthorized merchants,please do not purchase outside Lagunamoon Beauty store.Our essential oils are suitable for diffusion, vaporizing, inhalation, cleaning, massage, oil burner, perfume, home care (bedroom, living room, bathroom, study room), office (workstation, conference room), outdoors, campground, yoga room, car and spa.
Come with gift box and essential oil guide, outside with well transparent protective seal wrapping. A perfect gift set for any accassion.Try Lagunamoon if you've enjoyed products by other brands.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
